mapper.select: select co.course_name as courseName, va.vacate_id as vacateId, va.vacate_time as vacateTime, va.contacts as contacts, va.contacts_phone as contactsPhone, va.vacate_name as vacateName, va.vacate_cause as vacateCause, (select dict_name from edu_dict where dict_type='IS_CHACK_STATUS' and dict_value = va.is_check) as isCheck, (select dict_name from edu_dict where dict_type='VACATE_TYPE' and dict_value = va.vacate_type) as vacateTypeName from edu_vacate as va LEFT JOIN edu_course as co ON va.course_id = co.course_id where co.course_teacher = #{adminId} order by va.is_check DESC
mapper.sql: course_id, course_name, course_price, course_teacher, place_class, start_date, end_date, people_number, school_id
